title: 3 storied | 5 Units | House for sale @ Kalubowila
details:
3 storied | 5 Units | House for sale @ Kalubowila


5 perches, (4800sq,ft)

10 bed rooms with 6 bath rooms
Livings / Sittings & Dining areas
5 kitchens with 2 pantry areas
Separate 5 Electricity meters / 2 water supply
5 Assessment numbers & Separeate entrance
Roof top / Balconies / 3 water tanks with sump
All rooms having ceiling fans
Solid wooden Interior & Exterior
Double Bricked Walls (9 inch)
Parking space for 1 vehicle

20 Feet wide (carpet road)
200m to Saranankara road
200m to Kovila & Mosque
300m to Galle road (Wellawatta)
1km to Kalubowila hospital

39 million , 390 Laks (Negotiable)
